EmailTemplate.description: Alert E-mail That Alerts Users That the Account Plan Needs Updating
EmailTemplate.name: Account Plan Update
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Merchant_Account_Plan__c.Account__c}'s Account Plan Requires Updating
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Account Plan on account, {!Merchant_Account_Plan__c.Account__c}, has not been updated in 30 days or more and requires updating. To update the account plan please click here {!Merchant_Account_Plan__c.Link}.
